Ingredients.1: 0.5 pound large shrimp, peeled and deveined

Ingredients.2: 1 small onion, cut into thin strips

Ingredients.3: 1 small red bell pepper, cut into thin strips

Ingredients.4: 1 small green bell pepper, cut into thin strips

Ingredients.6: 1 tablespoon family-style fajita seasoning (such as Savory Spice Shop®), or to taste

Directions.1: Preheat the air fryer to 400 degrees F (200 degrees C) for 3 minutes.

Directions.2: Combine shrimp, onion, and bell peppers in a bowl and lightly coat with oil spray. Sprinkle fajita seasoning over the shrimp mixture; mix to combine. Transfer into the air fryer basket.

Directions.3: Air fry for 8 minutes. Squeeze lime juice over the shrimp mixture. Serve immediately with warm tortillas.
